name: One Night at Hell's Office
description: This game is about a man who works at hell to type some paperworks? yeah this game is weird, really weird cause it was litterally made by 13 year olds, in this game you play as a worker from hell thats traped in an office and you have to survive till 6:00 AM it's simillar to the "FNAF" Game but in this game instead of watching the cameras and closing some vents, you type paperworks, watch the door and survive ti'll 6:00 AM. You also have batteries so if you use too much power you'll run out of batteries. This Game is not scary at all(a little).
